actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Truth in Lending Act to protect consumers from the unauthorized disclosure of information relating to credit card transactions.

summary.text: Amends the Truth in Lending Act to prohibit a credit card issuer from providing any records or information relating to a cardholder's use of that issuer's credit card to a third party without the consent of the cardholder. Requires that a credit card issuer notify the cardholder of the receipt of a subpena before it can provide any information pursuant to such subpena.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Truth in Lending Act to protect consumers from the unauthorized disclosure of information relating to credit card transactions.
